import {React, useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { front } from '../utils/frontMovies' import Navbar from '../components/Navbar' import GenreSlider from '../components/GenreSlider' import Hero from '../components/Hero' import SeriesGenreSlider from '../components/SeriesGenreSlider' import Footer from '../components/Footer' function Home({hovered, hoveredMovieId, handleMouseEnter, handleMouseLeave}) { const [frontMovies, setFrontMovies]= useState([]) useEffect(()=>{ setFrontMovies(front) }, []) return (
) } export default Home
